page.title: 10AN OLD COTTAGE
page.content: { {Millie Scaife}lives at{5 West Row}it is a cottage that is very old.She has lived in the cottage for 12 years.The house is half brick and half stone.She likes living in{Sadberge}because it is nice and quiet here and the people are nice too.The living room and one bedroom are{200 years}old.The toilet used to be at the bottom of the garden but now it is in the house.There are three bedrooms upstairs,the toilet, shower and bathroom are downstairs. there are original{oak beams}on the ceiling of the main room.The whole row of houses were built at the same time. Millie likes the house becase its not on an estate and has a lovely view of the{church. }It is not on a busy road so it is safe for children when they are playing. By Leroy Buckley aged (10)
